title: Connectivity and mobile trends
itunes:title: Connectivity and mobile trends
description: Are consumers ready to embrace the faster, more reliable internet service that 5G wireless networks will deliver? How will next-generation connectivity, powered by 5G, impact the consumer ecosystem? Find out as our new podcast explores the findings from our Connectivity and Mobile Trends survey.

How will next-generation connectivity, powered by 5G, impact the consumer ecosystem? Find out as our new podcast explores the findings from our Connectivity and Mobile Trends survey.
